title: Niidzuma-Kun To Arao-Kun Okawari
alternative_title: Niiduma-kun to Arao-kun Okawari; Niizuma-kun to Arao-kun Okawari; 新妻くんと新夫くん おかわり;
status: Niiduma-kun to Arao-kun Okawari; Niizuma-kun to Arao-kun Okawari; 新妻くんと新夫くん おかわり;
description:
Description :
        The sequel story of Popular Host, Kakeru Arao, and Satoshi Natsuma, a very popular writer. The relationship started when I got drunk, he swooned and fell in love at first sight!As always, the newlywed husband is in danger of their lovers fiery aura in full bloom!But contrary to the newlywed husband who continues to seek platonic love, the offensive and defensive battle with the libido monster, Kakeru, still finds ways to deal with his new wife every-time. Going out together on off days and living like lovers, but the shadow creeping up on the two gives the feeling that living together will be like a storm!?!?Caregiver Host x Kimokawa-Yandere WriterQuestions and Answers of Love ?????[Also contains a four-page cartoon drawn for the electrical version only.]+
